availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Francis Terstegge (Jefferson County, KY, flour dealer & grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, retail grocer and flour dealer. Native of Germany. Married to Mary Schuckman Terstegge in Jefferson County on January 22, 1860. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1850. Retail grocer in Louisville in 1859. Retail grocer in Louisville in 1861. Signed a petition as a flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 3, p. 272A.

Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1860-61 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), 298.
